name: Armament Haki
text:
Main: You may attach 1 active DON!! card to your [Silvers Rayleigh]: Give up to 1 of your Leader or Character +1000 power during this turn. 
Counter: Give up to 1 of your Character or your [Silvers Rayleigh] +2000 power during this battle.

effect.text: You may attach 1 active DON!! card to your [Silvers Rayleigh]: Give up to 1 of your Leader or Character +1000 power during this turn.
Give up to 1 of your Character or your [Silvers Rayleigh] +2000 power during this battle.
